welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Upper Montclair, a charming city known for its beautiful parks and friendly community. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Teterboro Airport handles all commercial flights and is equipped with modern amenities for passenger convenience.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Teterboro Airport caters to private and corporate aircraft, offering luxurious facilities and services for VIP passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The oldest and smallest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The main terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, primarily used by United Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited coverage in certain areas.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for internet access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linden Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Linden Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network while waiting for their flight.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The smallest and oldest terminal at LaGuardia, serving mainly domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The largest terminal at LaGuardia, serving mainly domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: A modern terminal at LaGuardia, serving mainly domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: The newest terminal at LaGuardia, serving mainly domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: International flights for various airlines

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: International flights for Delta Airlines

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: International and domestic flights for various airlines

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: Domestic flights for JetBlue Airways

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: International and domestic flights for various airlines

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: Domestic flights for American Airlines

wifi.note: Free WiFi available throughout the airport

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal building where all domestic and international flights depart and arrive.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for private and chartered flights, providing a more exclusive and personalized experience for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply select the network and accept the terms and conditions to connect.
